Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman hit a second successive century to help Pakistan win the deciding one-day international against South Africa by 28 runs and take the series 2-1
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa have a depleted squad with Quinton de Kock, David Miller, Kagiso Rabada, Lungi Ngidi and Anrich Nortje all leaving for IPL
Pakistan are in Group 2 of the T20 World Cup
Captain Babar Azam emphasized Pakistan’s focus on improving their powerplay performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The South Africa vs Pakistan 1st T20I will be telecast by the Star Sports network on TV
South Africa vs Pakistan 1st T20I can be streamed live on Hotstar and Star Sports Network’s platforms
Others: South Africa vs Pakistan 1st T20I will begin at 6 PM IST on Saturday
The toss will take place at 5 PM IST
